title: Bighorn Canyon National Recreation Area: Volunteer
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Volunteer            Volunteer         2009 Volunteer Appreciation Picnic NPS Photo  For more information regarding the Bighorn Canyon National Recreation Area volunteer program, please contact Shawn Williams at 307-548-5406.  Current Volunteer Opportunities  BIGHORN CANYON NRA HORSESHOE BEND CAMPGROUND HOST Activities: Campground Host, Tour Guide/Interpretation Dates: May 2012 to September 2012   BIGHORN CANYON NRA TRAIL CREEK PRIMITIVE CAMPGROUND HOST Activities: Campground Host, Tour Guide/Interpretation Dates: May 2012 to September 2012  BIGHORN CANYON NRA AFTERBAY CAMPGROUND HOST Activities: Campground Host, Tour Guide/Interpretation Dates: May 2012 to September 2012 BIGHORN CANYON NRA CROOKED CREEK CONTACT STATION, INTERPRETATION Activities: Tour Guide/Interpretation Dates: May 2012 to September 2012  BIGHORN CANYON NRA AFTERBAY CONTACT STATION, INTERPRETATION  Activities: Tour Guide/Interpretation Dates: May 2012 to September 2012   To view more NPS volunteer opportunities, go to www.volunteer.gov/gov
